clinical_study.brief_title: Pathology Analysis of OPMD Patient Myotomies
clinical_study.official_title: Pathology Analysis of OPMD Patient Myotomies

brief_summary.textblock: The study aims to characterize the effect of OPMD mutation on muscle function. Muscle samples will be received from oculopharyngeal muscular dystrophy (OPMD) patients who undergo cricopharyngeal muscle-cutting surgery, as part of their routine healthcare and treatment.

primary_outcome.measure: Number of genes that show changes in RNA profile, measured by sequencing.
primary_outcome.time_frame: Data will be collected within four years.
primary_outcome.description: RNA profile analysis of OPMD muscle samples will be compared to unaffected muscle samples using sequencing to identify gene numbers.

primary_outcome.measure: Number of genes that show changes in protein profile, measured by SDS page.
primary_outcome.time_frame: Data will be collected within four years.
primary_outcome.description: Protein profile analysis of OPMD muscle samples will be compared to unaffected muscle samples to identify gene numbers using SDS page.

study_pop.textblock: Patients who suffer from oculopharyngeal muscular dystrophy (OPMD).

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- OPMD patients both male and female.
- OPMD patients between the ages 18-70 years.
- OPMD patients who are referred to the cricopharyngeal muscle-cutting surgery as part of their usual treatment.
